title: John Saves Carter (Person of Interest)(1 x 9)
author: Person of Interest Highlights
comment: I also love that Elias response is basically "fair enough". He has seen John in action from the other side, and has no particular desire to start a war with him. Maybe he'd win, maybe not, but either way it would be costly at best, and maybe end up with John exterminating every member of Elias gang and HR he could ID and get to
Watching this episode now and the weather during filming was for real. Raining ☔️ and Cold. Good show.  Good acting.
"Don't you care what happens to them?.... What is wrong with you?  You can't just play God!  You don't get to decide who lives and who dies!"  Excellent.  Excellent.  1:47
Dang not Carter, a hit on a detective fosco has to keep an eye on her. Alias could be the hitter . Not base ball . Like the show on Sundays at 1  /  3 pm.
description:
John saving Carter from one of her confidential informants who has been turned against her by Elias.
